summary: Domingos is a member of an African liberation movement, arrested by the Portuguese secret police, after bloody events in Angola. He does not betray his companions, but is beaten to death in... See full summary »
cast: Domingos de Oliveira|Elisa Andrade|Jean M'Vondo|Dino Abelino|Benoît Moutsila|Talagongo|Lopes Rodrigues|Henriette Meya|Manuel Videira|Ana Wilson
title: Sambizanga
